results.label: Wunderlist
results.description: Wunderlist is a freeware application from 6Wunderkinder that can be used for task management and list making. Tasks are categorized into lists, such as a shopping list or a to-do list. Tasks can have completion dates and reminders. Wunderlist supports a number of operating system platforms, including Microsoft Windows, Mac OS X, and Linux. Wunderlist offers online synchronization across multiple machines when lists are edited with internet access.
